Hinge is superior to Bumble and Tinder, on Android. Why? 1) The Hinge Android app doesn't require GPS, while using the app. This saves battery life; unlike Bumble & Tinder, which both require GPS. 2) Related to #1 -- for users who have homes in two different locations (such as myself), and, who want to search for matches in both areas, Hinge allows you to change your search location easily, without the restriction of GPS verification. 3) Hinge has cool "prompts," such as video and audio clips.
